# Sickening Entanglement (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Poison Spells|poison]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Area:** Plants in a 40-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Reflex partial and Fortitude negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 192

This spell functions as *[[Entangle (Spell)|entangle]]*, except the plants are coated with an irritating sap that creates a painful, itching rash on creatures that touch them. Any creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must succeed at a Fortitude save or be [[Sickened|sickened]] as long as it remains in the area and for 1d4 rounds afterward. This is a poison effect.
